DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to test in 52 overweight and obese women with polycystic ovary syndrome the effect of 6 months of treatment with either: exercise training, 25% dietary restriction or metformin in comparison to a control group receiving no intervention on the functions of the skeletal muscle and adipose tissue.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Weight & Insulin Sensitivity on Reproductive Function in PCOS: Studies in Skeletal Muscle & Adipose
DOC.detailed_description: The PULSE Ancillary study will last about 7 months. Participants will one or two additional procedures performed at baseline and during the week 24 testing. These procedures include a fat biopsy, a muscle biopsy or both.
DOC.criteria: Enrolled in PULSE Withdraw from PULSE
DOC.keyword: PCOS, Weight, Insulin Sensitivity, Reproductive Function
